sentences.en: a young team with strong fighting spirit
sentences.cn: 一支斗志昂扬的年轻队伍

sentences.en: Above all Susie is a great survivor, with a bright, indomitable spirit.
sentences.cn: 总之，苏茜不畏艰难，开朗乐观、不屈不挠。

sentences.en: Although Laurie is dead, I can feel his spirit with me.
sentences.cn: 劳里虽然已经过世，但我还能感觉到他的灵魂和我在一起。

sentences.en: an evil spirit
sentences.cn: 恶魔

sentences.en: Art was created to uplift the mind and the spirit.
sentences.cn: 艺术创作旨在陶冶情操。

sentences.en: Crystal Spirit unseated his rider in the Berkshire Hurdle at Newbury.
sentences.cn: 在纽伯里举行的伯克郡障碍赛中“水玉精灵”把骑师掀了下来。

sentences.en: he &B{entered into the spirit of} the occasion by dressing as a pierrot.
sentences.cn: 他打扮成丑角的模样全身心地投入了这个活动。

sentences.en: he can be quite candid when the spirit moves him.
sentences.cn: 只要他高兴，他有时也会相当坦率的。

sentences.en: he couldn't be here in person, but he is with us in spirit.
sentences.cn: 他虽然不能亲自到这来，但他的精神是和我们在一起的。

sentences.en: He was the founder and guiding spirit of New York's Shakespeare Festival.
sentences.cn: 他是纽约莎士比亚戏剧节的创始人及领导者。

sentences.en: Her independence of spirit marked her out from her male fellow officers.
sentences.cn: 她的独立精神使她有别于共事的男性军官。

sentences.en: His spirits were so low (= he was so sad ) that he refused to answer his phone.
sentences.cn: 他情绪非常低落，连电话也不愿接。

sentences.en: I like to think of myself as a free spirit.
sentences.cn: 我愿意把自己看成是个无拘无束的人。

sentences.en: I’m 85, but I still feel young in spirit.
sentences.cn: 我 85 岁了，但心依然感觉年轻。

sentences.en: I'm happy for James. He's a much-maligned player but has tremendous spirit.
sentences.cn: 我为詹姆士感到高兴，他虽然是一位饱受争议的球员，但他仍斗志昂扬。

sentences.en: I'm wondering if that was the spirit in the courtroom, too.
sentences.cn: 不知这是否也是法庭的精神。

sentences.en: Marian retains a restless, youthful spirit, in search of new horizons.
sentences.cn: 玛丽安怀着一颗年轻、不断进取的心去寻求新的天地。

sentences.en: Sandra is small, but she makes up for it with great spirit.
sentences.cn: 桑德拉身材瘦小，但她巨大的勇气弥补了这点不足。

sentences.en: Sparkling wine can also put you in the party spirit.
sentences.cn: 汽酒还可以提高玩乐的兴致。

sentences.en: The orchestra has more discipline now, but at the expense of spirit.
sentences.cn: 那个管弦乐团现在更有纪律性了，却丧失了灵魂。

sentences.en: The requirement for work permits violates the spirit of the 1950 treaty.
sentences.cn: 对工作许可证的要求违反了1950年条约的精神。

sentences.en: Their problem can only be solved in a spirit of compromise.
sentences.cn: 他们的问题只能通过妥协来解决。

sentences.en: They went into a trance to communicate with the spirit world.
sentences.cn: 他们进入出神状态与灵界交流。

sentences.en: This adaptation perfectly captures the spirit of Kurt Vonnegut's novel.
sentences.cn: 这次改编非常好地抓住了库尔特·冯内古特小说的精髓。

sentences.en: When they took away his freedom, they broke his spirit (= made him lose his courage ) .
sentences.cn: 他们剥夺了他的人身自由就等于挫伤了他的锐气。

words.tran_cn: 沮丧的；沉闷的；无生气的
圣歌（尤指美国南部黑人的）

phrases.tran_cn: 全身心地投入活动（尤指节庆活动）中
进取心，进取精神；创业精神
n. 无拘无束的人；自由自在的人
奥林匹克精神；奥运精神
开拓精神；首创精神；闯劲
n. 团队精神；合作精神

phrases.phrase: the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)心灵愿意，但肉体却软弱了；心有余而力不足
（在万物有灵论和神秘信仰中的）灵魂世界
在某人想（或喜欢）做某事时，只要某人高兴

trans.tran_cn: 精神，心灵，勇气，意志，灵魂，态度，忠诚度，情绪，（某种类型的）人，酒精
trans.tran_en: the qualities that make someone live the way they do, and make them different from other people
